body: I never played Idolmas games so I'm a bit clueless on the context. But this was worth to read. I'm glad that not only the producer is not the generic cuckboi looking guy but a UB, but also that he takes out the mom for a ride instead of just focusing on the loli all the time. And what's even better is that he not only impregnates both girls, but keeps impregnating them. The only problem I have with this is that I wish the mom realized that it was the producer who's been giving her the loving, instead of that bland cuck husband of hers. I wonder if the mom ever finds out?

@RonaldGrand6969 If I'm reading the ending right, then "Late Night Blooming"  ( Part 1: #310078, part 2: #338353 ) does have the Bull seemingly straight up ghosting the girl at the end after she fully fallen for him.
@RonaldGrand6969 there are... just search in reddit
